festivals.name: Foundation Day
festivals.description: Absalom's celebration of both its founding and the new year.

festivals.name: Longnight
festivals.description: Revelers stay awake through the longest winter night to defy the darkness and greet the dawn.

festivals.name: Merrymead
festivals.description: A celebration of approaching spring where the previous year's alcohol is consumed.

festivals.name: Leap Day
festivals.description: Followers of Mahathallah mark this rare day as Fateless Day, a time outside normal fate.

festivals.name: Day of Bones
festivals.description: A solemn holiday honoring Pharasma where the dead are remembered and tombs are tended.

festivals.name: Firstbloom
festivals.description: Fertility dances celebrate the coming of spring at the vernal equinox.

festivals.name: Planting Week
festivals.description: A holy week dedicated to Erastil when farmers engage in heavy field work.

festivals.name: Taxfest
festivals.description: Priests of Abadar accompany tax collectors to ensure fair taxation, followed by a feast.

festivals.name: Remembrance Moon
festivals.description: A solemn holiday honoring those who fell in the Shining Crusade against the Whispering Tyrant.

festivals.name: Sunwrought Festival
festivals.description: The summer solstice honors Sarenrae with fireworks and reenactments of her battle with Rovagug.

festivals.name: Burning Blades
festivals.description: A festival for Sarenrae culminating in sacred dances performed with flaming blades.

festivals.name: Archer's Day
festivals.description: Erastil's holy day celebrated with archery contests and livestock bartering.

festivals.name: Armasse
festivals.description: A day to train commoners in combat, honoring Iomedae's martial legacy.

festivals.name: Swallowtail Festival
festivals.description: The first day of autumn honors Desna with feasting and the release of butterflies.

festivals.name: Harvest Feast
festivals.description: The autumnal equinox celebration marks the harvest's end.

festivals.name: Ascendance Day
festivals.description: Iomedae's divine ascension is celebrated with ceremonies honoring her rise to goddess.

festivals.name: Jestercap
festivals.description: A day of pranks and practical jokes particularly favored by gnomes.

festivals.name: Seven Veils
festivals.description: Sivanah's sacred masquerade ball where participants disguise their identity behind magical veils.

festivals.name: Winter Week
festivals.description: A traditional feast serving as a time for courting and gathering with friends.

festivals.name: Candlemark
festivals.description: The winter solstice honors Sarenrae's healing power on the sun's weakest day.

festivals.name: Crystalhue
festivals.description: A winter solstice celebration of art and courtship honoring Shelyn with crystal prisms.

festivals.name: Night of the Pale
festivals.description: The last night of the year when ghosts of the recently dead manifest to visit their former homes.
